item.title: Tokenize It! Creation and Distribution of Tokens on Ethereum.
item.description: Sell yourself - but not below value! — Wolf_of_Wallstreet This technical guide shows how to create your own Personal Token, provide liquidity for it and transform it into an asset with Fixed Product Automated Market Making using Uniswap v2. Create your Personal Token As we want to keep this as short and easy as possible, we chose a ready-made solution. If you want to learn more about Token creation on Ethereum, head over to ethereum.
